393
Refutation by Parallel Reasoning
can be affected by other people having more money, if this raises prices and
thereby raises the amount of money that is necessary to buy things.
This fallacy is often called a fallacy of composition,because it rests on the
mistaken assumption that what is true of the parts is also true of the whole
that is composed out of those parts. Each person in a class
